CustomField.description: SE-1484 - Original story - HF-446 -AC #3: “The FSL Mobile Service Appointment overview and Work Order header info should align with the fields from the SD.4".
CustomField.formula: IF (ISBLANK(HRCFSL_JDE_ID__c),"", HRCFSL_JDE_ID__c) & IF (ISBLANK(HRCFSL_JDE_ID__c) || ISBLANK(LocationId),""," • ") & IF (ISBLANK(LocationId),"", Location.Name) & " • " & WorkType.Name & " • " & HRCFSL_Product_Item_Description__c
CustomField.label: Description
